text: Take a Hard Ride is a 1975 Italian American western movie. It was directed by Antonio Margheriti. Actors include Jim Brown, Lee Van Cleef, Fred Williamson, Jim Kelly, Dana Andrews, Barry Sullivan, Robert Donner, and Harry Carey, Jr. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1975 movies Category:1970s Western (genre) movies Category:Italian Western (genre) movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:Movies directed by Antonio Margheriti
